name: Enhanced UE Preemption for Privileged Access
summary: The feature enables the admission of HPA and emergency call users into the cell

parameters.name: AdmissionControl.recalcPreemptableUeTimer
parameters.description: The time-triggered cell registration for inter-cell UE preemption can                                 be configured with this attribute.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.peUeToInterCellPreHyst
parameters.description: The                                 attributes can be used to configure the threshold for registering                                 cells for inter-cell UE preemption.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.peUeToInterCellPreHyst
parameters.description: The                                 attributes can be used to configure the threshold for registering                                 cells for inter-cell UE preemption.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.peUeToInterCellPreThrUnreg
parameters.description: The                                 attributes can be used to configure the threshold for registering                                 cells for inter-cell UE preemption.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.peUeToInterCellPreThrUnreg
parameters.description: The                                 attributes can be used to configure the threshold for registering                                 cells for inter-cell UE preemption.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.paConnCellUeReservations
parameters.description: The PA reservation pool can be defined with these attributes.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.paConnCellUeReservations
parameters.description: The PA reservation pool can be defined with these attributes.

parameters.name: AdmissionControl.nrOfPaConnHpaReservPerCell
parameters.description: The HPA pool can be defined with this attribute.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_RELEASE
parameters.description: The following values are added:  EVENT_VALUE_INTER_CELL_UE_PREEMPTION     EVENT_VALUE_PREEMPTION_CELL_THRESHOLD_EXCEEDED

events.name: INTERNAL_PROC_UE_CTXT_RELEASE
events.description: The following values are added:  EVENT_VALUE_INTER_CELL_UE_PREEMPTION     EVENT_VALUE_PREEMPTION_CELL_THRESHOLD_EXCEEDED

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012630 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the CXC4012630 MO instance.
